name: GNOP (TobyDev)
description:
Overview

This game is like pong but backwards. Instead of trying to hit the ball, you must dodge the ball as it follows you. Who ever reaches 10 first wins. You get a point if the ball misses, the ball gets a point if it hits you. Press the pause button to pause the game.

Instructions

Use the W/S  or the Up/Down keys to move up and down. You can change different aspects of the game in the settings menu, which can be found when the game is paused.

Web Version

https://tobydev.itch.io/gnop-web-build
